attributes.action: Use Police force to prosecute MP's
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that only an independant police inquiry will get to the crux of this scandal. MP's should face prosecution for their expenses claims

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
